name: Diana's Lyre
description:
Explore the mysteries within the temple of Évora!

The story starts with an old rumor. This rumor says that a legendary lyre from the goddess Diana is still hidden away in a mysterious catacomb under the Temple of Diana. This story was passed down from generation to generation in Évora, and after many years, a curious aspiring archeologist decided to take on the challenge of solving this rumor. Can you help our little toad get through many puzzles and discover the hidden lyre?

Features
  • A single-player narrative puzzle game with a unique environment set in a Portuguese city!
  • Hand-made Animations!
  • Cute characters that will steal your heart!
Controls

Walk - [WASD] keys

Tongue - [SPACE] key

Tongue Movement - [AD] keys

Interact - [E] key

Options - [ESC] key
